welcome_message_body: Welcome to Noda, Japan! Get ready to experience the charming blend of traditional Japanese culture and modern city life. Explore our beautiful temples, enjoy our delicious local cuisine, and immerse yourself in the rich history and natural beauty of our city.

restaurants.name: Hamazushi (はま寿司)
restaurants.description: Hamazushi (はま寿司) is a sushi restaurant located in 野田市.

restaurants.name: White Gyoza (ホワイト餃子)
restaurants.description: White Gyoza (ホワイト餃子) is a dumpling restaurant located in 野田市.

restaurants.name: ハンディーレストラン
restaurants.description: ハンディーレストラン is a north indian restaurant located in 野田市.

restaurants.name: MOS Burger (モスバーガー)
restaurants.description: MOS Burger (モスバーガー) is a fast food restaurant located in 野田市.

restaurants.name: ラーメン爺
restaurants.description: ラーメン爺 is a ramen restaurant located in 吉川市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users must re-login every 3 hours.
